summary: Test suite that validates the CogView3+ text-to-image generation pipeline, using lightweight unit tests with mock components to verify features such as attention slicing, callback handling, and single versus batched inference, and providing integration tests that run the full pipeline on GPU for end-to-end verification.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the AI image generation pipeline before release, enabling early detection of regressions and confirming that key functionalities work as expected in production environments.
